POWERED by FUSION

A list of material output.

Books

I currently have a book in progress. Work is my top priority, so I don’t know when this new book will be complete. I’m not currently committed to a publisher, but I’m open to exploring that option.

September 2009, O’Reilly Media — Programming Scala, 1st Edition.
With Dean Wampler.

Upcoming Talks & Conference Participation

  • October, 2011, Portland — Onward! 2011
    Member of the program committee for this conference on the “multidisciplinarity of software development”.
  • July, 2011, Portland — Emerging Languages 2011
    Last year’s event has now turned into an official track at OSCON. I’m acting as chair of that track. The event will retain the same focus: featuring innovations in programming language design and implementation across academe, industry, and the open source hobbyist community.

Previous Talks & Conference Participation

  • December, 2010, Portland — Building Teams and Selecting Technology
    A presentation to the PDX Lean Startup Circle.
  • July, 2010, Portland — Emerging Languages Camp 2010
    Organized the first annual gathering of programming language innovators with a focus on relatively new languages and techniques.

    Joint presentations to OSCON’s Scala Summit.

    A presentation to Portland Code Camp.

    A presentation to Chirp, the Official Twitter Developer Conference.

    A presentation to the Future of Web Apps Conference.
